interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Lenghthening Mascara by Almay,Volume & Lift, Eye Makeup, Hypoallergenic and Fragrance Free, 010 Blackest Black, 0.24 Fl Oz
Review Date: 2021/03/11
Store: Almay
Product Description: ['Enjoy visibly longer, lifted lashes in one gentle swipe with Almay Length & Lift Mascara™. Our clean, flake-free formula is enriched with a lash-caring complex of plant-based waxes and hair conditioners that nourish for healthy looking eyelashes. Plus, the brush is made of 100% plant-derived bristles that are designed to evenly coat and separate lashes from root to tip. We also ensured that our newest mascara is smooth and buildable—no clumps or smudging—making it the perfect finishing touch to any look, be it everyday glam, a smoky eye, or cat eye. What’s more, we tested our product to ensure it is suitable for sensitive eyes and contact lens wearers, so go ahead and magnify lashes to your chosen intensity! And because we love the environment as much as we love your delicate eyes, part of the mascara packaging is made with post-consumer recycled materials. Formulated without added parabens, phthalates, SLS, mineral oil, DMDM Hydantoin, formaldehydes, and Triclosan. As always, hypoallergenic. Ophthalmologist tested. Clean. Cruelty free. Fragrance free.']
Average Rating: 4.2
Product Details: {'Color': '010 Blackest Black', 'Product Benefits': 'Conditioning', 'Special Feature': 'Not-Applicable', 'Material Type Free': 'Fragrance Free', 'Brand': 'Almay', 'Product Dimensions': '2.75 x 0.73 x 5.75 inches; 1.01 Ounces', 'Item model number': '7257548001', 'UPC': '309970143022', 'Manufacturer': 'AmazonUs/REVL7'}
Review Text: This mascara works great.  It lengths your lashes without clumping.  I love that its hypoallergenic.  There are a few brands that bother my eyes, especially during allergy season.  The very black is perfect for framing my eyes
Review Title: Works great
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
AIKIMUSE Eyebrow Pen BRUNETTE AIKIMUSE {'Brand': 'AIKIMUSE', 'Item Form': 'Pencil', 'Finish Type': 'Natural', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Package Dimensions': '5.58 x 4 x 0.75 inches; 0.81 Ounces'} This product started off promising but after one eye the color stopped coming out. Also the delineation between the four prongs blended into one.
It could have been better but sadly it's not working. Started off good but QIC 4D Silk Fiber Lash Mascara, Fiber Mascara, Waterproof Mascara, Natural Thick Thickening and Lengthening Mascara Lasting All Day, Waterproof, Smudge Proof Eyelashes Joruby {'Special Feature': 'Smudge Proof, Waterproof', 'Brand': 'Joruby', 'Specialty': 'Waterproof', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Package Information': 'Tube', 'Package Dimensions': '5.1 x 2 x 1 inches; 0.63 Ounces'} I'm always looking for a good mascara that will make my lashes appear thicker and longer. I thought this product worked well. Some other fiber mascara 's have various steps to achieve this while this is a one step process. I do find d the fiber mascara to be thicker and sticker than traditional mascara 's.
Although this does have a faint odor it worked well Good but a little smelly Purple Hair Mask for Blonde with Keratin & Jojoba Oil - Platinum & Silver Hair - Instantly Eliminate Brassiness & Yellows - Made in USA - Hair Toner - Bleached & Highlighted Hair - Sulfate Free - 8 oz WELLUTION {'Brand': 'WELLUTION', 'Item Form': 'Oil', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Hair Type': 'Damaged,Dry,Color-treated', 'Product Benefits': 'Hydrating Treatment', 'Package Dimensions': '3.07 x 2.9 x 2.8 inches; 8 Ounces', 'UPC': '749715278440'} I’m outside a lot in the summer and my hair sees a lot of sun and chlorine from the pool. It’s also becoming lighter with more grey. I was excited about trying this. I’ve used it for a few days and adult didn’t notice a huge change in the tone. It does feel somewhat softer though
I’m also not a fan of the packaging. There isn’t a pump or squeeze bottle. You just stick your hand in the jar. Not a change in tone PHOERA 30ml Foundation Liquid Full Coverage 24HR Matte Oil Control Concealer (Nude & Buff Beige) with 6ml Makeup Face Primer & Kabuki Foundation Brush Flat Top SIGHTLING {'Product Dimensions': '1.18 x 0.79 x 1.18 inches; 4.97 Ounces', 'UPC': '779296966696'} I really liked the look and feel of this foundation. It went on easily for a full coverage smooth look. I usually use a sponge when applying foundation but I really liked the easy of the brush. The only downside is that neither color worked. Great coverage LAPOTHICELL Blemish Out Serum 55mL, Blemish care, soothing care, for brighten & luminous skin LAPOTHICELL {'Product Dimensions': '1.65 x 1.65 x 4.13 inches; 3.77 Ounces'} I've been using this for about a week a cm I know it usually takes about 21 days to see a change but I'm hopeful that the positive results will continue. I have sun damage spots and I'm hoping to diminish them for a more even skin tone. This product is easy to use. You use the dropper and spread the product on you face. I like to use at night after washing my face but I suppose you can use it in the morning if you prefer. It does go on a little sticky but it dries quickly. Refreshing LUXAZA 6 PCS Purple Eyeshadow Stick,Light Shimmer Cream Eyeshadow Crayon,Pro Smoky Waterproof & Long Lasting Eyeshadow Stick Set LUXAZA {'Brand': 'LUXAZA', 'Item Form': 'Crayon,Cream Eyeshadow', 'Finish Type': 'Metallic', 'Special Feature': 'Waterproof, Long lasting', 'Product Benefits': 'Long Lasting', 'Package Dimensions': '5.83 x 5 x 0.87 inches; 3.21 Ounces'} These are fun and easy to use. I like that color easily apply the color I want quickly. The colors aren't my cuppa but I can work with them. I was able to blend with a more neutral shade to get the perfect look that I wanted. A good eyeshadow pencil Rancco Dried Flower Buds Fragrant Petals Ball, 10 Kinds Natural Organic Flowers Ball, Premium Grade Dried Blooming Flower Tea Balls for Tea, Baking or Bath Bombs Rancco {'Brand': 'Rancco', 'Scent': 'Honey, Rose, Lily', 'Material Feature': 'Vegan', 'Unit Count': '10.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '10', 'Package Dimensions': '9.49 x 6.26 x 1.1 inches; 3.88 Ounces'} I was excited for the petal balls but they left me wanting more. They arrived in a brown bag and were smaller than I anticipated -about 1" around. All the petal balls are in color foil. The smell isn't the best and they aren't labeled so I was unsure what flower ball I was using. These could really be a wow in a bathroom or add to your bath time enjoyment if they were larger, had a better smell and you could tell which petal ball you were using. Could be better Lenghthening Mascara by Almay,Volume & Lift, Eye Makeup, Hypoallergenic and Fragrance Free, 010 Blackest Black, 0.24 Fl Oz Almay ['Enjoy visibly longer, lifted lashes in one gentle swipe with Almay Length & Lift Mascara™. Our clean, flake-free formula is enriched with a lash-caring complex of plant-based waxes and hair conditioners that nourish for healthy looking eyelashes. Plus, the brush is made of 100% plant-derived bristles that are designed to evenly coat and separate lashes from root to tip. We also ensured that our newest mascara is smooth and buildable—no clumps or smudging—making it the perfect finishing touch to any look, be it everyday glam, a smoky eye, or cat eye. What’s more, we tested our product to ensure it is suitable for sensitive eyes and contact lens wearers, so go ahead and magnify lashes to your chosen intensity! And because we love the environment as much as we love your delicate eyes, part of the mascara packaging is made with post-consumer recycled materials. Formulated without added parabens, phthalates, SLS, mineral oil, DMDM Hydantoin, formaldehydes, and Triclosan. As always, hypoallergenic. Ophthalmologist tested. Clean. Cruelty free. Fragrance free.'] {'Color': '010 Blackest Black', 'Product Benefits': 'Conditioning', 'Special Feature': 'Not-Applicable', 'Material Type Free': 'Fragrance Free', 'Brand': 'Almay', 'Product Dimensions': '2.75 x 0.73 x 5.75 inches; 1.01 Ounces', 'Item model number': '7257548001', 'UPC': '309970143022', 'Manufacturer': 'AmazonUs/REVL7'} This mascara works great. profile:
**User Summary:**

The user's beauty product preferences are increasingly refined, with a notable commitment to skincare that enhances skin luminosity and addresses sun damage, reflecting a desire for an even complexion. They continue to show a keen interest in eyebrow enhancement products for a natural finish and prioritize volumizing and lengthening mascaras that are user-friendly. Their exploration of hair care for color-treated hair remains steady, accompanied by a preference for full-coverage foundations with a smooth finish.

Recent interactions demonstrate high quality expectations, emphasizing reliability and effectiveness, and the user’s feedback remains constructive. Their recent purchase of a hypoallergenic mascara, which they rated highly for its performance and suitability for sensitive eyes, underscores their focus on eye makeup that enhances and nourishes while fitting into a clean beauty ethos. 

The user maintains a willingness to explore varied product categories, as seen in their earlier purchase of fragrant tea balls, which they found less satisfying. Their mixed ratings reveal a discerning approach, rewarding satisfying products while providing balanced feedback on those that fall short. Overall, their holistic approach to beauty and wellness prioritizes effective, functional products across skincare, makeup, and personal care while ensuring a commitment to thorough evaluation and an adaptive beauty routine.
